title: 4/4/17 - Online Privacy, Hollywood and Politics with Cullen Hoback and Mark Duplass"
description:
Billy Graham under fire for his 'Marriage Rule'...and why the left has a problem with it ...Ty Cobb is not the bad guy history tells us he was...Filmmaker Cullen Hobeck of 'Terms and Conditions May Apply' joins Glenn to discuss Congresses move to overturn the online privacy rules ...Hollywood Actor/Filmmaker Mark Duplass joins Glenn to talk about coming together..."It's like the country is in a terrible divorce"...

The Glenn Beck Program with Glenn Beck, Pat Gray, Stu Burguiere and Jeff Fisher, Weekdays 9a–12pm ET on TheBlaze Radio

Facebook: Glenn BeckTwitter: @glennbeck
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
